title: 4.DA.1
text: The student will identify the appropriate type of data needed to solve a problem or answer a question.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Analyze a problem to determine the appropriate type of data needed.
Evaluate the reliability of data sources.
Use numeric values to represent non-numeric ideas to include binary, American Standard Code for Information Interchange (ASCII), and RGB values.
Collect, store, clean, and organize data for analysis and to prepare visualizations.
